articles.title: A Google-backed weapon to battle wildfires made it into orbit - TechCrunch
articles.description: The constellation will keep a close eye on wildfires, eventually imaging nearly all of the Earth’s surface once every 20 minutes.
articles.content:
The first satellite of the Google-backed FireSat constellation successfully made it to orbit over the weekend, kicking off what promises to be a new era in wildfire detection and monitoring.
